name: LIS
description:
First of all it is a bad game. This game is a simple FPS game made in total of 15 hours for SAUDIGN gamejam.
The concept is you are in a spaceship trying to scape in the game you have to go to the control panel so good luck doing so..

Do not forget to play the little minigame :).
How to play:
  • WASD: Movement
  • Space: Jump
  • Left Mouse: Fire
